name: Unidentified_scrapper
content:
A humanoid male scrapper worked for the Scrapper Guild on the junk-strewn planet Bracca following the formation of the Galactic Empire. When the former clone commandos unit known as the Bad Batch visited Bracca to use the medical facility of one of the planet's wrecked Venator-class Star Destroyers, the scrapper spotted the clone trooper Hunter while on patrol. Confirming the presence of intruders, the scrapper told his companion to alert the Empire.
The scrapper appeared, albeit unidentified, in "Battle Scars," the seventh episode of Star Wars: The Bad Batch, released on Disney+ on June 11, 2021. He was voiced by Liam O'Brien.
